packages.title: Royal Rajasthan Tour
packages.description: Explore the royal heritage of Rajasthan with visits to Jaipur, Udaipur, Jodhpur, and Jaisalmer.
highlights: A royal journey through Rajasthan's cultural and historical landmarks.
packages.itinerary:
Day 1: Jaipur - Arrival and sightseeing
Day 2: Udaipur - Lake Pichola boat ride
Day 3: Jodhpur - Explore Mehrangarh Fort
Day 4: Jaisalmer - Desert safari and camel ride
Day 5: Jaipur - Return journey

packages.title: Kerala Backwaters Escape
packages.description: Experience the serene beauty of Kerala’s backwaters with houseboat stays and Ayurvedic wellness.
highlights: A tranquil journey through Kerala’s lush landscapes and serene waters.
packages.itinerary:
Day 1: Arrival in Kochi
Day 2: Alleppey - Houseboat stay
Day 3: Kumarakom - Bird sanctuary visit
Day 4: Kovalam - Relax at the beach
Day 5: Departure

packages.title: Golden Triangle Tour
packages.description: Discover the iconic cities of Delhi, Agra, and Jaipur, including a visit to the Taj Mahal.
highlights: Visit India’s most famous cultural and historical landmarks.
Witness the beauty of the Taj Mahal.
Explore bustling markets and vibrant culture.
packages.itinerary:
Day 1: Delhi - City tour
Day 2: Agra - Visit Taj Mahal
Day 3: Jaipur - Amber Fort exploration
Day 4: Jaipur - Local market tour
Day 5: Delhi - Return journey

packages.title: Spiritual Varanasi Journey
packages.description: Immerse yourself in the spiritual essence of Varanasi with Ganga Aarti and temple visits.
highlights: Experience the spiritual core of India’s holiest city.
Visit ancient temples and sacred sites.
packages.itinerary:
Day 1: Arrival in Varanasi
Day 2: Ganga Aarti and temple tour
Day 3: Sarnath excursion
Day 4: Departure

packages.title: Himalayan Adventure in Manali
packages.description: Enjoy thrilling adventures like trekking, paragliding, and skiing in the scenic town of Manali.
highlights: An action-packed adventure in the heart of the Himalayas.
Thrilling activities like paragliding and skiing.
packages.itinerary:
Day 1: Arrival in Manali
Day 2: Solang Valley - Paragliding
Day 3: Rohtang Pass - Skiing
Day 4: Trekking expedition
Day 5: Local sightseeing
Day 6: Departure

packages.title: Andaman Islands Beach Retreat
packages.description: Relax on the pristine beaches of the Andaman Islands with snorkeling and island-hopping experiences.
highlights: Relax on white sandy beaches and turquoise waters.
Enjoy snorkeling among vibrant coral reefs.
Experience island-hopping to explore secluded spots.
packages.itinerary:
Day 1: Arrival at Port Blair
Day 2: Havelock Island - Snorkeling and Radhanagar Beach
Day 3: Neil Island - Natural Bridge visit
Day 4: Ross Island - Historical tour
Day 5: Chidiya Tapu - Sunset and nature trail
Day 6: Departure
